snippet: The Vatican signed an agreement on Friday to permit Rome’s pediatric hospital to use the Vatican’s helipad to transport emergency patients.
abstract: Vatican agrees to allow Bambin Gesu, hospital in Rome and one of largest pediatric hospitals and research centers in Europe, to use its helipad for emergency patients and organs.
lead_paragraph: The Vatican signed an agreement on Friday to permit Rome’s pediatric hospital to use the Vatican’s helipad to transport emergency patients.

headline.main: The Vatican: A New Use for the Pope’s Helipad
